intro: No, this isn't a quiz about guys named Rich. We're talking money, moolah, dinero... and what the Bible says about it. Put your money where your mouth is, and tell us what you know.

questions.ask: What feeling toward money is "a root of all kinds of evil"?
What two things, according to Jesus, destroy treasures on earth?
What coming day, according to the Proverbs, shows the worthlessness of wealth?
What dishonest quality of wealth, according to Jesus' parable of the sower, causes some Christians to be unfruitful?
What word did the apostle Paul use to describe wealth or riches in his first letter to Timothy?

intro: You won't find the Mississippi or the Amazon in the Bible, but several other rivers are noted. What do you recall of them?

questions.ask: What future leader of Israel, as a three-month-old baby, was placed in a basket in the river of Egypt-the Nile?
What form did the Holy Spirit take when it descended on Jesus after His baptism in the Jordan River?
Of the four rivers that were said to flow from the Garden of Eden, what two share names with important rivers of the modern Middle East?
What leprous army commander, told to wash in the Jordan for healing, preferred to wash in the Abana or Pharpar rivers of his homeland?
Where does "the river of the water of life" in the new Jerusalem originate?

intro: Looking for a little romance? Try the Bible's story of Ruth - that's where the question in this quiz come from.

questions.ask: What great-grandson of Ruth became the most prominent king of Israel?
What was Ruth doing the first time she saw Boaz, the man she would marry?
What role did Boaz play by marrying Ruth and purchasing the property of her former in-laws?
What was the name of Ruth's first husband, who died?
What name, meaning "Bitter," did Ruth's newly-widowed mother-in-law give herself?

intro: You noticed the quotation marks? Then you already know that every answer in this quiz begins with the letter R

questions.ask: What did Jesus say He came to call sinners to?
What daughter of Bethuel was wife of the patriarch Isaac?
What kind of lion does the apostle Peter compare the devil to?
What name - also the name of a bay in Delaware - did Isaac give to a well dug?
What kind of fire does the prophet Malachi say the Lord will be like in the day of judgment?
